member.name: M:GalaxySMS.Business.WebApi.Controllers.UserSessionController.SignInRequest(System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage,GalaxySMS.Client.Entities.UserSignInRequest)
member.summary: Sign in to the system to obtain a SessionToken.
member.remarks: If successful, the SessionToken property must be preserved and the SessionId property must be used for subsequent calls. The determine if the operation is successful, all of the following must be true: - Response Code must be 200 - RequestResult must be either Success (1) or SuccessWithInfo (2)
